text:
Urbana, Illinois
August 14, 1941
Mr. Maurice Noviok
Station WHYC
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City
Dear Mauryi
You will note on the tentative program
for Friday morning you are listed as one of the
speakers under the general theme of national defense.
That will give you a chance to say whatever is on
your mind. The talk need not be formal. We may
not be able to get all of the speakers but if we
get three out of the four that ought to provide a
good session for the opener.
Cordially yours,
Frank E. Schooley
Executive Secretary
